alert.note: Alert for Broadwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 13 at 11:53AM MDT until June 16 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Montana... Missouri River at DCP-Toston affecting Broadwater County. .Recent upstream rainfall and snowmelt will cause the Missouri River to rise to near flood stage in the coming days. For the Missouri River...including DCP-Toston. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Missouri River at DCP-Toston. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water floods low lying areas near Highway 287. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by tomorrow morning.this evening at 800 PM MDT.
